bibl.title: Roman Consuls, Imperial Politics, and Egyptian Papyri: The Consulates of 325 and 344 CE.
bibl.note: The Egyptian formula. - The year 325. - Iulianus. - Proculus. - P. Oxy. VI, 889 [= S.B. XVI, 12306]. - Proculus: nobilis or novus homo? - The year 344. - East and West. - The wrong general. - Conclusions.
